Line plot for SR, PR and SR + PR for BNDs

Source: R/sv.R
plot_bnd_sr_pr_tot_lines.Rd

Plots the number of split reads (SR), paired end reads (PR), and their sum (tot) across all BNDs, sorted by tot.

plot_bnd_sr_pr_tot_lines(
  d,
  title = "SR, PR and SR + PR line plot for BNDs",
  subtitle = "Events are sorted by decreasing tot values."
)

Arguments

d

A data.frame with an SR_PR_alt column.
title

Main title of plot.
subtitle

Subtitle of plot.

Value

A ggplot2 plot object.

Examples

x <- system.file("extdata/umccrise/sv/manta.tsv", package = "gpgr")
d <- process_sv(x)$unmelted
plot_bnd_sr_pr_tot_lines(d)
